attack.name: Frigid Cold Arrow
attack.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to {1} of March 7th's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: The Power of Cuteness
skill.desc: Provides a single ally with a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to {1} of March 7th's DEF plus {4} for {2} turn(s).\nIf the ally's current HP percentage is {3} or higher, greatly increases the chance of enemies attacking that ally.

ultimate.name: Glacial Cascade
ultimate.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to {1} of March 7th's ATK to all enemies. Hit enemies have a {2} base chance to be Frozen for {3} turn(s).\nWhile Frozen, enemies cannot take action and will receive Additional Ice DMG equal to {4} of March 7th's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

talent.name: Girl Power
talent.desc: After a Shielded ally is attacked by an enemy, March 7th immediately Counters, dealing Ice DMG equal to {1} of her ATK. This effect can be triggered {2} time(s) each turn.

mazeattack.name: Attack
mazeattack.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

technique.name: Freezing Beauty
technique.desc: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, there is a {1} <u>base chance</u> to Freeze a random enemy for {2} turn(s).\nWhile Frozen, the enemy cannot take action and will take <u>Additional</u> Ice DMG equal to {3} of March 7th's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

attack.name: Cloudlancer Art: North Wind
attack.desc: Deals Wind DMG equal to {1} of Dan Heng's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Cloudlancer Art: Torrent
skill.desc: Deals Wind DMG equal to {1} of Dan Heng's ATK to a single enemy.\nOn a CRIT Hit, there is a {4} base chance to reduce the target's SPD by {2} for {3} turn(s).

ultimate.name: Ethereal Dream
ultimate.desc: Deals Wind DMG equal to {1} of Dan Heng's ATK to a single enemy. If the enemy is Slowed, the Ultimate's DMG multiplier increases by {2}.

talent.name: Superiority of Reach
talent.desc: When Dan Heng is the target of an ally's ability, his next attack's Wind RES PEN increases by {1}. This effect can be triggered again after {2} turn(s).

mazeattack.name: Attack
mazeattack.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

technique.name: Splitting Spearhead
technique.desc: After Dan Heng uses his Technique, his ATK increases by {1} at the start of the next battle for {2} turn(s).

attack.name: Sawblade Tuning
attack.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to {1} of Himeko's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Molten Detonation
skill.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to {1} of Himeko's ATK to a single enemy and Fire DMG equal to {2} of Himeko's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.

ultimate.name: Heavenly Flare
ultimate.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to {1} of Himeko's ATK to all enemies. Himeko regenerates {2} extra Energy for each enemy defeated.

talent.name: Victory Rush
talent.desc: When an enemy is inflicted with Weakness Break, Himeko gains 1 point of Charge (max {2} points).\nIf Himeko is fully Charged when an ally performs an attack, Himeko immediately performs 1 follow-up attack and deals Fire DMG equal to {1} of her ATK to all enemies, consuming all Charge points.\nAt the start of the battle, Himeko gains 1 point of Charge.

mazeattack.name: Attack
mazeattack.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

technique.name: Incomplete Combustion
technique.desc: After using Technique, creates a dimension that lasts for {4} second(s). After entering battle with enemies in the dimension, there is a {1} <u>base chance</u> to increase Fire DMG taken by enemies by {2} for {3} turn(s). Only 1 dimension created by allies can exist at the same time.

attack.name: Gravity Suppression
attack.desc: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to {1} of Welt's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Edge of the Void
skill.desc: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to {1} of Welt's ATK to a single enemy and further deals DMG 2 extra times, with each time dealing Imaginary DMG equal to {1} of Welt's ATK to a random enemy. On hit, there is a {2} base chance to reduce the enemy's SPD by {3} for {4} turn(s).

ultimate.name: Synthetic Black Hole
ultimate.desc: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to {1} of Welt's ATK to all enemies, with a {3} base chance for enemies hit by this ability to be Imprisoned for 1 turn.\nImprisoned enemies have their actions delayed by {2} and SPD reduced by {4}.

talent.name: Time Distortion
talent.desc: When hitting an enemy that is already Slowed, Welt deals Additional Imaginary DMG equal to {1} of his ATK to the enemy.

mazeattack.name: Attack
mazeattack.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

technique.name: Gravitational Imprisonment
technique.desc: After using Welt's Technique, create a dimension that lasts for {4} second(s). Enemies in this dimension have their Movement SPD reduced by {5}. After entering battle with enemies in the dimension, there is a {1} <u>base chance</u> to Imprison the enemies for 1 turn.\nImprisoned enemies have their <u>actions delayed</u> by {2} and SPD reduced by {3}. Only 1 dimension created by allies can exist at the same time.

attack.name: Midnight Tumult
attack.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to {1} of Kafka's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Caressing Moonlight
skill.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to {1} of Kafka's ATK to a target enemy and Lightning DMG equal to {3} of Kafka's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.\nIf the target enemy is currently receiving DoT, all DoTs currently placed on that enemy immediately produce DMG equal to {2} of their original DMG.

ultimate.name: Twilight Trill
ultimate.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to {1} of Kafka's ATK to all enemies, with a {2} base chance for enemies hit to become Shocked and immediately take DMG from their current Shock state, equal to {5} of its original DMG. Shock lasts for {3} turn(s).\nWhile Shocked, enemies receive Lightning DoT equal to {4} of Kafka's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

talent.name: Gentle but Cruel
talent.desc: After an ally of Kafka's uses Basic ATK on an enemy target, Kafka immediately launches 1 follow-up attack and deals Lightning DMG equal to {1} of her ATK to that target, with a {2} base chance to inflict Shock equivalent to that applied by her Ultimate to the attacked enemy target, lasting for {3} turns. This effect can only be triggered 1 time per turn.

mazeattack.name: Attack
mazeattack.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

technique.name: Mercy Is Not Forgiveness
technique.desc: Immediately attacks all enemies within a set range. After entering battle, deals Lightning DMG equal to {3} of Kafka's ATK to all enemies, with a {1} <u>base chance</u> to inflict Shock equivalent to that applied by her Ultimate on every enemy target for {2} turn(s).

attack.name: System Warning
attack.desc: Deals Quantum DMG equal to {1} of Silver Wolf's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Allow Changes?
skill.desc: There is a {2} base chance to add 1 Weakness of an on-field character's Type to the target enemy. This also reduces the enemy's DMG RES to that Weakness Type by {4} for {3} turn(s). If the enemy already has that Type Weakness, the effect of DMG RES reduction to that Weakness Type will not be triggered. Each enemy can only have 1 Weakness implanted by Silver Wolf. When Silver Wolf implants another Weakness to the target, only the most recent implanted Weakness will be kept. In addition, there is a {5} base chance to further reduce the All-Type RES of the enemy by {6} for {7} turn(s). Deals Quantum DMG equal to {1} of Silver Wolf's ATK to this enemy.

ultimate.name: User Banned
ultimate.desc: There's a {2} base chance to decrease the target enemy's DEF by {3} for {4} turn(s). And at the same time, deals Quantum DMG equal to {1} of Silver Wolf's ATK to the target enemy.

talent.name: Awaiting System Response...
talent.desc: Silver Wolf can create three types of Bugs: reduce ATK by {1}, reduce DEF by {2}, and reduce SPD by {3}.\nEvery time Silver Wolf attacks, she has a {4} base chance to implant a random Bug that lasts for {5} turn(s) in an enemy target.

mazeattack.name: Attack
mazeattack.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

technique.name: Force Quit Program
technique.desc: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals Quantum DMG equal to {1} of Silver Wolf's ATK to all enemies, and ignores Weakness Types and reduces Toughness from all enemies. Enemies with their Weakness Broken in this way will trigger the Quantum Weakness Break effect.

attack.name: Lightning Rush
attack.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to {1} of Arlan's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Shackle Breaker
skill.desc: Consumes Arlan's HP equal to {1} of his Max HP to deal Lightning DMG equal to {2} of Arlan's ATK to a single enemy. If Arlan does not have sufficient HP, his HP will be reduced to 1 after using his Skill.

ultimate.name: Frenzied Punishment
ultimate.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to {1} of Arlan's ATK to a single enemy and Lightning DMG equal to {2} of Arlan's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.

talent.name: Pain and Anger
talent.desc: Increases Arlan's DMG for every percent of HP below his Max HP, up to a max of {1} more DMG.

technique.name: Swift Harvest
technique.desc: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals Lightning DMG equal to {1} of Arlan's ATK to all enemies.

skill.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to {1} of Asta's ATK to a single enemy and further deals DMG for 4 extra times, with each time dealing Fire DMG equal to {1} of Asta's ATK to a random enemy.

ultimate.name: Astral Blessing
ultimate.desc: Increases SPD of all allies by {1} for {2} turn(s).

talent.name: Astrometry
talent.desc: Gains 1 stack of Charging for every different enemy hit by Asta plus an extra stack if the enemy hit has Fire Weakness.\nFor every stack of Charging Asta has, all allies' ATK increases by {1}, up to {2} time(s).\nStarting from her second turn, Asta's Charging stack count is reduced by {3} at the beginning of every turn.

mazeattack.name: Attack

ultimate.name: It's Magic, I Added Some Magic
ultimate.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to {1} of Herta's ATK to all enemies.

talent.name: Fine, I'll Do It Myself
talent.desc: When an ally's attack causes an enemy's HP percentage to fall to {1} or lower, Herta will launch a follow-up attack, dealing Ice DMG equal to {2} of Herta's ATK to all enemies.

technique.name: It Can Still Be Optimized

skill.name: Combat Redeployment
skill.desc: Dispels a debuff from a single ally, allows them to immediately take action, and increases their DMG by {1} for {3} turn(s).\nWhen this Skill is used on Bronya herself, she cannot immediately take action again.

ultimate.name: The Belobog March
ultimate.desc: Increases the ATK of all allies by {1}, and increases their CRIT DMG equal to {2} of Bronya's CRIT DMG plus {3} for {4} turn(s).

talent.desc: After using her Basic ATK, Bronya's next action will be Advanced Forward by {1}.

technique.name: Banner of Command
technique.desc: After using Bronya's Technique, at the start of the next battle, all allies' ATK increases by {1} for {2} turn(s).

skill.desc: Increases Seele's SPD by {2} for {3} turn(s) and deals Quantum DMG equal to {1} of Seele's ATK to a single enemy.

ultimate.name: Butterfly Flurry

While in the buffed state, the DMG of Seele's attacks increases by {1} for {2} turn(s).\nEnemies defeated in the extra turn provided by "Resurgence" will not trigger another "Resurgence."

mazeattack.name: Attack
mazeattack.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

technique.desc: After using her Technique, Seele gains Stealth for {1} second(s). While Stealth is active, Seele cannot be detected by enemies. And when entering battle by attacking enemies, Seele will immediately enter the buffed state.

ultimate.name: Here Comes the Mechanical Fever
ultimate.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to {1} of Serval's ATK to all enemies. Enemies already Shocked will extend the duration of their Shock state by {2} turn(s).

talent.desc: After Serval attacks, deals Additional Lightning DMG equal to {1} of Serval's ATK to all Shocked enemies.

technique.desc: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals Lightning DMG equal to {4} of Serval's ATK to a random enemy, with a {1} <u>base chance</u> for all enemies to become Shocked for {3} turn(s).\nWhile Shocked, enemies will take Lightning DoT equal to {2} of Serval's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

attack.name: Fist of Conviction

skill.name: Daunting Smite
skill.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to {1} of Gepard's ATK to a single enemy, with a {2} base chance to Freeze the enemy for {3} turn(s).\nWhile Frozen, the enemy cannot take action and will take Additional Ice DMG equal to {4} of Gepard's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

ultimate.name: Enduring Bulwark
ultimate.desc: Applies a Shield to all allies, absorbing DMG equal to {1} of Gepard's DEF plus {3} for {2} turn(s).

talent.name: Unyielding Will
talent.desc: When struck with a killing blow, instead of becoming knocked down, Gepard's HP immediately restores to {1} of his Max HP. This effect can only trigger once per battle.

mazeattack.name: Attack

attack.name: Behind the Kindness
attack.desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to {1} of Natasha's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Love, Heal, and Choose
skill.desc: Restores a single ally for {1} of Natasha's Max HP plus {4}. Restores the ally for another {2} of Natasha's Max HP plus {5} at the beginning of each turn for {3} turn(s).

ultimate.name: Gift of Rebirth
ultimate.desc: Heals all allies for {1} of Natasha's Max HP plus {2}.

talent.name: Innervation
talent.desc: When healing allies with HP percentage at {1} or lower, increases Natasha's Outgoing Healing by {2}. This effect also works on continuous healing.

mazeattack.name: Attack

technique.name: Hypnosis Research
technique.desc: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals Physical DMG equal to {4} of Natasha's ATK to a random enemy, with a {1} <u>base chance</u> to Weaken all enemies.\nWhile Weakened, enemies deal {2} less DMG to allies for {3} turn(s).

attack.name: Frost Shot
attack.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to {1} of Pela's ATK to a single target enemy.

skill.name: Frostbite
skill.desc: Removes {2} buff(s) and deals Ice DMG equal to {1} of Pela's ATK to a single target enemy.

ultimate.name: Zone Suppression
ultimate.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to {4} of Pela's ATK to all enemies, with a {1} base chance to inflict Exposed on all enemies.\nWhen Exposed, enemies' DEF is reduced by {2} for {3} turn(s).

talent.name: Data Collecting
talent.desc: If the enemy is debuffed after Pela's attack, Pela will restore {1} additional Energy. This effect can only be triggered 1 time per attack.

mazeattack.name: Attack

technique.name: Preemptive Strike
technique.desc: Immediately attacks the enemy. Upon entering battle, Pela deals Ice DMG equal to {4} of her ATK to a random enemy, with a {1} <u>base chance</u> of lowering the DEF of all enemies by {2} for {3} turn(s).

attack.name: I Want to Help
attack.desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to {1} of Clara's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Svarog Watches Over You
skill.desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to {1} of Clara's ATK to all enemies, and additionally deals Physical DMG equal to {2} of Clara's ATK to enemies marked by Svarog with a Mark of Counter.\nAll Marks of Counter will be removed after this Skill is used.

ultimate.name: Promise, Not Command
ultimate.desc: After Clara uses Ultimate, DMG dealt to her is reduced by an extra {4}, and she has greatly increased chances of being attacked by enemies for {3} turn(s).\nIn addition, Svarog's Counter is enhanced. When an ally is attacked, Svarog immediately launches a Counter, and its DMG multiplier against the enemy increases by {2}. Enemies adjacent to it take 50% of the DMG dealt to the target enemy. Enhanced Counter(s) can take effect {5} time(s).

talent.name: Because We're Family
talent.desc: Under the protection of Svarog, DMG taken by Clara when hit by enemy attacks is reduced by {3}. Svarog will mark enemies who attack Clara with his Mark of Counter and retaliate with a Counter, dealing Physical DMG equal to {2} of Clara's ATK.

mazeattack.name: Attack
mazeattack.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

technique.name: A Small Price for Victory
technique.desc: Immediately attacks the enemy. Upon entering battle, the chance Clara will be attacked by enemies increases for {1} turn(s).

attack.desc: Deals Wind DMG equal to {1} of Sampo's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Ricochet Love
skill.desc: Deals Wind DMG equal to {2} of Sampo's ATK to a single enemy, and further deals DMG for {1} extra time(s), with each time dealing Wind DMG equal to {2} of Sampo's ATK to a random enemy.

ultimate.name: Surprise Present
ultimate.desc: Deals Wind DMG equal to {1} of Sampo's ATK to all enemies, with a {4} base chance to increase the targets' DoT taken by {2} for {3} turn(s).

talent.name: Windtorn Dagger
talent.desc: Sampo's attacks have a {1} base chance to inflict Wind Shear for {3} turn(s).\nEnemies inflicted with Wind Shear will take Wind DoT equal to {2} of Sampo's ATK at the beginning of each turn. Wind Shear can stack up to {4} time(s).

mazeattack.name: Attack
mazeattack.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

technique.name: Shining Bright
technique.desc: After Sampo uses his Technique, enemies in a set area are inflicted with Blind for {1} second(s). Blinded enemies cannot detect your team.\nWhen initiating combat against a Blinded enemy, there is a {2} <u>fixed chance</u> to delay all enemies' action by {3}.

attack.name: Hehe! Don't Get Burned!
attack.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to {1} of Hook's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Hey! Remember Hook?
skill.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to {1} of Hook's ATK to a single enemy. In addition, there is a {2} base chance to inflict Burn for {3} turn(s).\nWhen afflicted with Burn, enemies will take Fire DoT equal to {4} of Hook's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

ultimate.name: Boom! Here Comes the Fire!
ultimate.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to {1} of Hook's ATK to a single enemy.\nAfter using Ultimate, the next Skill to be used is Enhanced, which deals DMG to a single enemy and enemies adjacent to it.

talent.name: Ha! Oil to the Flames!
talent.desc: When attacking a target afflicted with Burn, deals Additional Fire DMG equal to {1} of Hook's ATK and regenerates {2} extra Energy.

mazeattack.name: Attack
mazeattack.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

technique.name: Ack! Look at This Mess!
technique.desc: Immediately attacks the enemy. Upon entering battle, Hook deals Fire DMG equal to {4} of her ATK to a random enemy. In addition, there is a {1} <u>base chance</u> to inflict Burn on every enemy for {3} turn(s).\nWhen afflicted with Burn, enemies will take Fire DoT equal to {2} of Hook's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

undefined.name: Hey! Remember Hook?
undefined.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to {1} of Hook's ATK to a single enemy, with a {2} base chance to Burn them for {3} turn(s). Additionally, deals Fire DMG equal to {5} of Hook's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.\nWhen afflicted with Burn, enemies will take Fire DoT equal to {4} of Hook's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

attack.name: Ice Crampon Technique
attack.desc: Deals Quantum DMG equal to {1} of this character's Max HP to a single enemy.

skill.name: Salted Camping Cans

If the target ally is a character on the Path of Destruction or Preservation, the chance of them being attacked by enemies will greatly increase. "Survival Response" lasts for {3} turn(s).\nRestores the target's HP by {4} of Lynx's Max HP plus {5}.

ultimate.name: Snowfield First Aid
ultimate.desc: Dispels {1} debuff(s) from all allies and immediately restores their respective HP by an amount equal to {2} of Lynx's Max HP plus {3}.

talent.name: Outdoor Survival Experience
talent.desc: When using Lynx's Skill or Ultimate, applies continuous healing to the target ally for {1} turn(s), restoring the target ally's HP by an amount equal to {2} of Lynx's Max HP plus {3} at the start of each turn. If the target has "Survival Response", the continuous healing effect additionally restores HP by an amount equal to {4} of Lynx's Max HP plus {5}.

mazeattack.name: Attack
mazeattack.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

technique.name: Chocolate Energy Bar
technique.desc: After Lynx uses her Technique, at the start of the next battle, all allies are granted her Talent's continuous healing effect, lasting for {1} turn(s).

attack.desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to {1} of Luka's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Lacerating Fist
skill.desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to {1} of Luka's ATK to a single enemy target. In addition, there is a {2} base chance to inflict Bleed on them, lasting for {5} turn(s).\nWhile Bleeding, the enemy will take {3} of their Max HP as Physical DoT at the start of each turn. This DMG will not exceed more than {4} of Luka's ATK.

ultimate.name: Coup de Grâce
ultimate.desc: Receives {5} stack(s) of Fighting Will, with a {2} base chance to increase a single enemy target's DMG received by {3} for {4} turn(s). Then, deals Physical DMG equal to {1} of Luka's ATK to the target.

talent.name: Flying Sparks
talent.desc: After Luka uses his Basic ATK "Direct Punch" or Skill "Lacerating Fist," he receives {1} stack of Fighting Will, up to 4 stacks. When he has 2 or more stacks of Fighting Will, his Basic ATK "Direct Punch" is enhanced to "Sky-Shatter Fist." After his Enhanced Basic ATK's "Rising Uppercut" hits a Bleeding enemy target, the Bleed status will immediately deal DMG for 1 time equal to {2} of the original DMG to the target. At the start of battle, Luka will possess 1 stack of Fighting Will.

mazeattack.name: Attack
mazeattack.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

technique.name: Anticipator
technique.desc: Immediately attacks the enemy. Upon entering battle, Luka deals Physical DMG equal to {1} of his ATK to a random single enemy with a {2} <u>base chance</u> to inflict his Skill's Bleed effect on the target. Then, Luka gains 1 additional stack of Fighting Will.

undefined.name: Sky-Shatter Fist
undefined.desc: Consumes 2 stacks of Fighting Will. First, uses Direct Punch to deal 3 hits, with each hit dealing Physical DMG equal to {1} of Luka's ATK to a single enemy target.\nThen, uses Rising Uppercut to deal 1 hit, dealing Physical DMG equal to {2} of Luka's ATK to the single enemy target.

attack.name: Deficit...
attack.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to {1} of Topaz's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Difficulty Paying?
skill.desc: Inflicts a single target enemy with a Proof of Debt status, increasing the DMG it takes from follow-up attacks by {2}. Proof of Debt only takes effect on the most recent target it is applied to. If there are no enemies inflicted with Proof of Debt on the field when an ally's turn starts or when an ally takes action, Topaz will inflict a random enemy with Proof of Debt.\nNumby deals Fire DMG equal to {1} of Topaz's ATK to this target. Using this Skill to deal DMG is considered as launching a follow-up attack.

ultimate.name: Turn a Profit!
ultimate.desc: Numby enters the Windfall Bonanza! state and its DMG multiplier increases by {1} and CRIT DMG increases by {2}. Also, when enemies with Proof of Debt are hit by an ally's Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate, Numby's action is Advanced Forward by {3}. Numby exits the Windfall Bonanza! state after using {4} attacks.

talent.name: Trotter Market!?
talent.desc: Summons Numby at the start of battle. Numby has {1} SPD by default. When taking action, Numby launches follow-up attacks on a single enemy target afflicted with Proof of Debt, dealing Fire DMG equal to {2} of Topaz's ATK.\nWhen enemies afflicted with Proof of Debt receive an ally's follow-up attacks, Numby's action is Advanced Forward by {3}. The action Advance Forward effect cannot be triggered during Numby's own turn.\nWhen Topaz is downed, Numby disappears.

mazeattack.name: Attack
mazeattack.desc: After attacking an enemy and entering battle, the enemy target's corresponding Type Toughness will be Weakened.

technique.name: Explicit Subsidy
technique.desc:
Summons Numby when Topaz enters the overworld. Numby will automatically search for Basic Treasures and Trotters within a set radius.
Using her Technique will regenerate {1} Energy for Topaz after Numby's first attack in the next battle.
If Topaz is still in the team after using her Technique and defeating overworld enemies, a small bonus amount of credits will be added to the earned credits. A maximum of {2} bonus credits can be received per calendar day.
After using her Technique and defeating enemies in Simulated Universe, additionally receive a small amount of Cosmic Fragments with a small chance to obtain 1 random Curio.

attack.name: Flower Pick
attack.desc: Tosses 1 jade tile from the suit with the fewest tiles in hand to deal Quantum DMG equal to {1} of Qingque's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: A Scoop of Moon
skill.desc: Immediately draws {1} jade tile(s) and increases DMG by {2} until the end of the current turn. This effect can stack up to {3} time(s). The turn will not end after this Skill is used.

ultimate.name: A Quartet? Woo-hoo!
ultimate.desc: Deals Quantum DMG equal to {1} of Qingque's ATK to all enemies, and obtains 4 jade tiles of the same suit.

talent.name: Celestial Jade
talent.desc: When an ally's turn starts, Qingque randomly draws 1 tile from 3 different suits and can hold up to 4 tiles at one time.\nIf Qingque starts her turn with 4 tiles of the same suit, she consumes all tiles to enter the "Hidden Hand" state.\nWhile in this state, Qingque cannot use her Skill again. At the same time, Qingque's ATK increases by {1}, and her Basic ATK "Flower Pick" is enhanced, becoming "Cherry on Top!" The "Hidden Hand" state ends after using "Cherry on Top!".

mazeattack.name: Attack
mazeattack.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

technique.name: Game Solitaire
technique.desc: After using Technique, Qingque draws {1} jade tile(s) when the battle starts.

undefined.name: Cherry on Top!
undefined.desc: Deals Quantum DMG equal to {1} of Qingque's ATK to a single enemy, and deals Quantum DMG equal to {2} of Qingque's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.\n"Cherry on Top!" cannot recover Skill Points.

attack.name: Dislodged
attack.desc: Tingyun deals Lightning DMG equal to {1} of her ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Soothing Melody
skill.desc: Grants a single ally with Benediction to increase their ATK by {2}, up to {4} of Tingyun's current ATK.\nWhen the ally with Benediction attacks, they will deal Additional Lightning DMG equal to {1} of that ally's ATK for 1 time.\nBenediction lasts for {3} turn(s) and is only effective on the most recent receiver of Tingyun's Skill.

ultimate.name: Amidst the Rejoicing Clouds
ultimate.desc: Regenerates {1} Energy for a single ally and increases the target's DMG by {3} for {2} turn(s).

talent.name: Violet Sparknado
talent.desc: When an enemy is attacked by Tingyun, the ally with Benediction immediately deals Additional Lightning DMG equal to {1} of that ally's ATK to the same enemy.

mazeattack.name: Attack
mazeattack.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

technique.name: Gentle Breeze
technique.desc: Tingyun immediately regenerates {1} Energy upon using her Technique.

attack.name: Thorns of the Abyss
attack.desc: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to {1} of Luocha's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Prayer of Abyss Flower
skill.desc: After using his Skill, Luocha immediately restores the target ally's HP equal to {1} of Luocha's ATK plus {2}. Meanwhile, Luocha gains 1 stack of Abyss Flower.\nWhen any ally's HP percentage drops to {3} or lower, an effect equivalent to Luocha's Skill will immediately be triggered and applied to this ally for one time (without consuming Skill Points). This effect can be triggered again after {4} turn(s).

ultimate.name: Death Wish
ultimate.desc: Removes {2} buff(s) from all enemies and deals all enemies Imaginary DMG equal to {1} of Luocha's ATK. At the same time, Luocha gains 1 stack of Abyss Flower.

talent.name: Cycle of Life
talent.desc: When Abyss Flower reaches {1} stacks, Luocha consumes all stacks of Abyss Flower to deploy a Field against the enemy.\nWhen any enemy in the Field is attacked by an ally, the attacking ally's HP is immediately restored by an amount equal to {2} of Luocha's ATK plus {4}.\nThe Field's effect lasts for {3} turns. When Luocha is knocked down, the Field will be dispelled.

mazeattack.name: Attack
mazeattack.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

technique.name: Mercy of a Fool
technique.desc: After the Technique is used, the Talent will be immediately triggered at the start of the next battle.

attack.name: Glistening Light
attack.desc: Jing Yuan deals Lightning DMG equal to {1} of his ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Rifting Zenith
skill.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to {1} of Jing Yuan's ATK to all enemies and increases Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action by {2} for the next turn.

ultimate.name: Lightbringer
ultimate.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to {1} of Jing Yuan's ATK to all enemies and increases Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action by {2} for the next turn.

talent.name: Prana Extirpated
talent.desc: Summons Lightning-Lord at the start of the battle. Lightning-Lord has {1} base SPD and {4} base Hits Per Action. When the Lightning-Lord takes action, its hits are considered as follow-up attacks, with each hit dealing Lightning DMG equal to {2} of Jing Yuan's ATK to a random single enemy, and enemies adjacent to it also receive Lightning DMG equal to {5} of the DMG dealt to the target enemy. The Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action can reach a max of {6}. Every time Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action increases by 1, its SPD increases by {3}. After the Lightning-Lord's action ends, its SPD and Hits Per Action return to their base values. When Jing Yuan is knocked down, the Lightning-Lord will disappear. When Jing Yuan is affected by Crowd Control debuff, the Lightning-Lord is unable to take action.

mazeattack.name: Attack
mazeattack.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

technique.name: Spirit Invocation
technique.desc: After the Technique is used, the Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action in the first turn increases by {1} at the start of the next battle.

attack.name: Shard Sword
attack.desc: Deals {1} of Blade's ATK as Wind DMG to a target enemy.

skill.name: Hellscape
skill.desc: Consumes HP equal to {1} of Blade's Max HP to enter the Hellscape state. When Hellscape is active, his Skill cannot be used, his DMG dealt increases by {4}, and his Basic ATK Shard Sword is enhanced to Forest of Swords for {2} turn(s). If Blade's current HP is insufficient, his HP will be reduced to 1 when he uses his Skill. This Skill does not regenerate Energy. Using this Skill does not end the current turn.

ultimate.name: Death Sentence
ultimate.desc: Sets Blade's current HP to 50% of his Max HP and deals Wind DMG to a single enemy equal to the sum of {1} of his ATK, {2} of his Max HP, and {5} of the tally of Blade's HP loss in the current battle. At the same time, deals Wind DMG to adjacent targets equal to the sum of {3} of his ATK, {4} of his Max HP, and {6} of the tally of his HP loss in the current battle.\nThe tally of Blade's HP loss in the current battle is capped at {7} of his Max HP. This value will be reset and re-accumulated after his Ultimate has been used.

talent.name: Shuhu's Gift
talent.desc: When Blade sustains DMG or consumes his HP, he gains 1 stack of Charge, stacking up to 5 times. A max of 1 Charge stack can be gained every time he is attacked.\nWhen Charge stack reaches maximum, immediately launches a follow-up attack on all enemies, dealing Wind DMG equal to {2} of Blade's ATK plus {4} of his Max HP. At the same time, restores Blade's HP by {3} of his Max HP. After the follow-up attack, all Charges are consumed.

mazeattack.name: Attack
mazeattack.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

technique.name: Karma Wind
technique.desc: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering combat, consumes {2} of Blade's Max HP while dealing Wind DMG equal to {1} of his Max HP to all enemies.\nIf Blade's current HP is insufficient, his HP will be reduced to 1 when this Technique is used.

undefined.name: Forest of Swords
undefined.desc: Consumes HP equal to {1} of Blade's Max HP and deals Wind DMG equal to the sum of {2} of his ATK and {4} of his Max HP to a single enemy. In addition, deals Wind DMG equal to the sum of {3} of Blade's ATK and {5} of his Max HP to adjacent targets.\nIf Blade's current HP is insufficient, his HP will be reduced to 1 when using Forest of Swords.\nForest of Swords cannot regenerate Skill Points.

attack.name: Cloudfencer Art: Starshine
attack.desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to {1} of Sushang's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Cloudfencer Art: Mountainfall
skill.desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to {1} of Sushang's ATK to a single enemy. In addition, there is a {3} chance to trigger Sword Stance on the final hit, dealing Additional Physical DMG equal to {2} of Sushang's ATK to the enemy.\nIf the enemy is inflicted with Weakness Break, Sword Stance is guaranteed to trigger.

ultimate.name: Shape of Taixu: Dawn Herald
ultimate.desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to {1} of Sushang's ATK to a single enemy target, and she immediately takes action again. In addition, Sushang's ATK increases by {4} and using her Skill has 2 extra chances to trigger Sword Stance for {2} turn(s).\nSword Stance triggered from the extra chances deals {3} of the original DMG.

talent.name: Dancing Blade
talent.desc: When an enemy has their Weakness Broken on the field, Sushang's SPD increases by {1} for {2} turn(s).

mazeattack.name: Attack
mazeattack.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

technique.name: Cloudfencer Art: Warcry
technique.desc: Immediately attacks the enemy. Upon entering battle, Sushang deals Physical DMG equal to {1} of her ATK to all enemies.

attack.name: Arrowslinger
attack.desc: Deals {1} of Yukong's ATK as Imaginary DMG to a target enemy.

skill.name: Emboldening Salvo
skill.desc: Obtains {1} stack(s) of "Roaring Bowstrings" (to a maximum of 2 stacks). When "Roaring Bowstrings" is active, the ATK of all allies increases by {2}, and every time an ally's turn (including Yukong's) ends, Yukong loses 1 stack of "Roaring Bowstrings."\nWhen it's the turn where Yukong gains "Roaring Bowstrings" by using Skill, "Roaring Bowstrings" will not be removed.

ultimate.name: Diving Kestrel
ultimate.desc: If "Roaring Bowstrings" is active on Yukong when her Ultimate is used, additionally increases all allies' CRIT Rate by {2} and CRIT DMG by {3}. At the same time, deals Imaginary DMG equal to {1} of Yukong's ATK to a single enemy.

talent.name: Seven Layers, One Arrow
talent.desc: Basic ATK additionally deals Imaginary DMG equal to {1} of Yukong's ATK, and increases the Toughness-Reducing DMG of this attack by {2}. This effect can be triggered again after {3} turn(s).

mazeattack.name: Attack
mazeattack.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

technique.name: Chasing the Wind
technique.desc: After using her Technique, Yukong enters Sprint mode for {1} seconds. In Sprint mode, her Movement SPD increases by {2}, and Yukong gains {3} stack(s) of "Roaring Bowstrings" when she enters battle by attacking enemies.

attack.name: Novaburst
attack.desc: Deals Quantum DMG equal to {1} of Fu Xuan's Max HP to a single enemy.

skill.name: Known by Stars, Shown by Hearts
skill.desc: Activates Matrix of Prescience, via which other team members will Distribute {1} of the DMG they receive (before this DMG is mitigated by any Shields) to Fu Xuan for {3} turn(s).\nWhile affected by Matrix of Prescience, all team members gain the Knowledge effect, which increases their respective Max HP by {4} of Fu Xuan's Max HP, and increases CRIT Rate by {5}.\nWhen Fu Xuan is knocked down, the Matrix of Prescience will be dispelled.

ultimate.name: Woes of Many Morphed to One
ultimate.desc: Deals Quantum DMG equal to {1} of Fu Xuan's Max HP to all enemies and obtains 1 trigger count for the HP Restore effect granted by Fu Xuan's Talent.

talent.name: Bleak Breeds Bliss
talent.desc: While Fu Xuan is still active in battle, Misfortune Avoidance is applied to the entire team. With Misfortune Avoidance, allies take {1} less DMG.\nWhen Fu Xuan's current HP falls to {2} of her Max HP or less, HP Restore will be triggered for Fu Xuan, restoring her HP by {3} of the amount of HP she is currently missing. This effect cannot be triggered if she receives a killing blow. This effect possesses 1 trigger count by default and can have a maximum of 2 trigger counts.

mazeattack.name: Attack
mazeattack.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

technique.name: Of Fortune Comes Fate
technique.desc: After the Technique is used, all team members receive a Barrier, lasting for {1} seconds. This Barrier can block all enemy attacks, and the team will not enter battle when attacked. Entering battle while the Barrier is active will have Fu Xuan automatically activate Matrix of Prescience at the start of the battle, lasting for {2} turn(s).

attack.name: Frost Thorn
attack.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to {1} of Yanqing's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Darting Ironthorn
skill.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to {1} of Yanqing's ATK to a single enemy and activates Soulsteel Sync for 1 turn.

ultimate.name: Amidst the Raining Bliss
ultimate.desc: Increases Yanqing's CRIT Rate by {1}. When Soulsteel Sync is active, increases Yanqing's CRIT DMG by an extra {2}. This buff lasts for one turn. Afterwards, deals Ice DMG equal to {3} of Yanqing's ATK to a single enemy.

talent.name: One With the Sword
talent.desc: When Soulsteel Sync is active, Yanqing is less likely to be attacked by enemies. Yanqing's CRIT Rate increases by {1} and his CRIT DMG increases by {2}. After Yanqing attacks an enemy, there is a {3} fixed chance to perform a follow-up attack, dealing Ice DMG equal to {4} of Yanqing's ATK to the enemy, which has a {6} base chance to Freeze the enemy for 1 turn.\nThe Frozen target cannot take action and receives Additional Ice DMG equal to {5} of Yanqing's ATK at the beginning of each turn.\nWhen Yanqing receives DMG, the Soulsteel Sync effect will disappear.

mazeattack.name: Attack
mazeattack.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

technique.name: The One True Sword
technique.desc: After using his Technique, at the start of the next battle, Yanqing deals {2} more DMG for {3} turn(s) to enemies whose current HP is {1} or higher.

attack.name: Standing Ovation
attack.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to {1} of Guinaifen's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Blazing Welcome
skill.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to {1} of Guinaifen's ATK to a single enemy and deals Fire DMG equal to {2} of Guinaifen's ATK to any adjacent enemies with a {3} base chance to Burn the target and adjacent targets. When Burned, enemies will take a Fire DoT equal to {4} of Guinaifen's ATK at the beginning of each turn, lasting for {5} turn(s).

ultimate.name: Watch This Showstopper
ultimate.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to {1} of Guinaifen's ATK to all enemies. If the target enemy is currently inflicted with Burn, then their Burn status immediately produce DMG equal to {2} of their original DMG.

talent.name: PatrAeon Benefits
talent.desc: When Guinaifen is on the field, there is a {1} base chance to apply Firekiss to an enemy after their Burn status causes DMG. While inflicted with Firekiss, the enemy receives {4} increased DMG, which lasts for {5} turn(s) and can stack up to {6} time(s).

mazeattack.name: Attack
mazeattack.desc: After attacking an enemy and entering battle, the enemy target's corresponding Type Toughness will be Weakened.

technique.name: Skill Showcase
technique.desc: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals DMG for {2} time(s), dealing Fire DMG equal to {1} of Guinaifen's ATK to a random single enemy target each time, with a {3} <u>base chance</u> of inflicting Firekiss on them.

attack.name: Diagnostic Kick
attack.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to {1} of Bailu's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Singing Among Clouds
skill.desc: Heals a single ally for {1} of Bailu's Max HP plus {2}. Bailu then heals random allies {4} time(s). After each healing, HP restored from the next healing is reduced by {3}.

ultimate.name: Felicitous Thunderleap
ultimate.desc: Heals all allies for {1} of Bailu's Max HP plus {2}.\nBailu applies Invigoration to allies that are not already Invigorated. For those already Invigorated, Bailu extends the duration of their Invigoration by 1 turn.\nThe effect of Invigoration can last for {3} turn(s). This effect cannot stack.

talent.name: Gourdful of Elixir
talent.desc: After an ally with Invigoration is hit, restores the ally's HP for {1} of Bailu's Max HP plus {2}. This effect can trigger {5} time(s).\nWhen an ally receives a killing blow, they will not be knocked down. Bailu immediately heals the ally for {3} of Bailu's Max HP plus {4} HP. This effect can be triggered 1 time per battle.

mazeattack.name: Attack
mazeattack.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

technique.name: Saunter in the Rain
technique.desc: After Technique is used, at the start of the next battle, all allies are granted Invigoration for {1} turn(s).

attack.name: Lucent Moonglow
attack.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to {1} of Jingliu's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Transcendent Flash
skill.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to {1} of Jingliu's ATK to a single enemy and obtains {2} stack(s) of Syzygy.

ultimate.name: Florephemeral Dreamflux
ultimate.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to {1} of Jingliu's ATK to a single enemy, and deals Ice DMG equal to {3} of Jingliu's ATK to any adjacent enemies. Gains {2} stack(s) of Syzygy after attack ends.

talent.name: Crescent Transmigration
talent.desc: When Jingliu has {5} stack(s) of Syzygy, she enters the Spectral Transmigration state with her Action Advanced by {6} and her CRIT Rate increases by {7}. Then, Jingliu's Skill "Transcendent Flash" becomes enhanced and turns into "Moon On Glacial River," and becomes the only ability she can use in battle. When Jingliu uses an attack in the Spectral Transmigration state, she consumes HP from all other allies equal to {2} of their respective Max HP (this cannot reduce allies' HP to lower than 1). Jingliu's ATK increases by {3} of the total HP consumed from all allies in this attack, capped at {4} of her base ATK, lasting until the current attack ends. Jingliu cannot enter the Spectral Transmigration state again until the current Spectral Transmigration state ends. Syzygy can stack up to 3 times. When Syzygy stacks become 0, Jingliu will exit the Spectral Transmigration state.

mazeattack.name: Attack
mazeattack.desc: After attacking an enemy and entering battle, the enemy's corresponding Type Toughness will be Weakened.

technique.name: Shine of Truth
technique.desc: After using this Technique, creates a dimension around Jingliu that lasts for {3} seconds, and all enemies in this dimension will become Frozen. After entering combat with enemies in the dimension, Jingliu immediately regenerates {6} Energy and obtains {1} stack(s) of Syzygy, with a {2} <u>base chance</u> of Freezing enemy targets for {4} turn(s). While Frozen, enemy targets cannot take action, and receive Ice <u>Additional DMG</u> equal to {5} of Jingliu's ATK at the start of every turn. Only 1 dimension created by allies can exist at the same time.

undefined.name: Moon On Glacial River
undefined.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to {1} of Jingliu's ATK to a single enemy, and deals Ice DMG equal to {3} of Jingliu's ATK to adjacent enemies. Consumes {2} stack(s) of Syzygy. Using this ability does not consume Skill Points.

attack.name: Beneficent Lotus
attack.desc: Uses a 2-hit attack and deals Imaginary DMG equal to {1} of Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae's ATK to a single enemy target.

skill.name: Dracore Libre
skill.desc: Enhances Basic ATK. Enhancements may be applied up to 3 times consecutively. Using this ability does not consume Skill Points and is not considered as using a Skill. Enhanced once, Beneficent Lotus becomes Transcendence. Enhanced twice, Beneficent Lotus becomes Divine Spear. Enhanced thrice, Beneficent Lotus becomes Fulgurant Leap. When using Divine Spear or Fulgurant Leap, starting from the fourth hit, 1 stack of Outroar is gained before every hit. Each stack of Outroar increases Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae's CRIT DMG by {1}, for a max of {2} stacks. These stacks last until the end of his turn.

ultimate.name: Azure's Aqua Ablutes All
ultimate.desc: Uses a 3-hit attack and deals Imaginary DMG equal to {1} of Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae's ATK to a single enemy target. At the same time, deals Imaginary DMG equal to {2} of Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae's ATK to adjacent targets. Then, obtains {3} Squama Sacrosancta.\nIt's possible to hold up to {4} Squama Sacrosancta, which can be used to offset Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae's consumption of skill points. Consuming Squama Sacrosancta is considered equivalent to consuming skill points.

talent.name: Righteous Heart
talent.desc: After each hit dealt during an attack, Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae gains 1 stack of Righteous Heart, increasing his DMG by {1}. This effect can stack up to {2} time(s), lasting until the end of his turn.

mazeattack.name: Attack
mazeattack.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

technique.name: Heaven-Quelling Prismadrakon
technique.desc: After using his Technique, Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae enters the Leaping Dragon state for {2} seconds. While in the Leaping Dragon state, using his attack enables him to move forward rapidly for a set distance, attacking all enemies he touches and blocking all incoming attacks. After entering combat via attacking enemies in the Leaping Dragon state, Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae deals Imaginary DMG equal to {3} of his ATK to all enemies, and gains {1} Squama Sacrosancta.

undefined.name: Fulgurant Leap
undefined.desc: Uses a 7-hit attack and deals Imaginary DMG equal to {1} of Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae's ATK to a single enemy target. From the fourth hit onward, simultaneously deal Imaginary DMG equal to {2} of Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae's ATK to adjacent targets.

attack.name: Ice-Breaking Light
attack.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to {1} of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy and gains 1 stack of Magma Will.

skill.name: Ever-Burning Amber
skill.desc: Increases the Trailblazer's DMG Reduction by {1} and gains 1 stack of Magma Will, with a {2} base chance to Taunt all enemies for {3} turn(s).

ultimate.name: War-Flaming Lance
ultimate.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to {1} of the Trailblazer's ATK plus {2} of the Trailblazer's DEF to all enemies. The next Basic ATK will be automatically enhanced and does not cost Magma Will.

talent.name: Treasure of the Architects
talent.desc: Each time the Trailblazer is hit, they gain 1 stack of Magma Will for a max of {3} stack(s).\nWhen Magma Will has no fewer than 4 stacks, the Trailblazer's Basic ATK becomes enhanced, dealing DMG to a single enemy and enemies adjacent to it.\nWhen the Trailblazer uses Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate, apply a Shield to all allies that absorbs DMG equal to {1} of the Trailblazer's DEF plus {4}. The Shield lasts for {2} turn(s).

mazeattack.name: Attack
mazeattack.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

technique.name: Call of the Guardian
technique.desc: After using Technique, at the start of the next battle, gains a Shield that absorbs DMG equal to {1} of the Trailblazer's DEF plus {2} for {3} turn(s).

undefined.name: Ice-Breaking Light
undefined.desc: Consumes 4 stacks of Magma Will to enhance Basic ATK, dealing Fire DMG equal to {1} of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy and Fire DMG to equal to {2} of the Trailblazer's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.
